description: Presidential Secretariat - Appointed Mr. Murugesu Ganeshamoorthy as Secretary to the Ministry of National Intergration & Reconciliation from 09.11.2015. Notifying that Hon. Thilak Janaka Marapana has resigned the Office of Minister of Law & Order & Prison Reforms from 09.11.2015. Appointed Hon. D.M. Swaminathan as Minister of Prison Reforms, Rehabilitation, Resettlement & Hindu Religious Affairs & Hon. Sagala Gajendra Ratnayaka as Minister of Law & Order & Southern Development from 11.11.2015
